description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-an-issue/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-an-issue/)

Return details on an individual issue. This returns the basic stats for the issue (title, last seen, first seen), some overall numbers (number of comments, user reports) as well as the summarized event data.

### Path Parameters

`issue_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The ID of the issue to retrieve.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `event:read`
